product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner presents a modern and sophisticated design featuring a central product image set against a smooth, abstract background. The top section includes a bold, centered headline (`heading`) in large uppercase font, paired with a more delicate subtitle (`subheading`) right below it. Both text layers are horizontally aligned and styled to highlight elegance and fashion. The product image (`product_image`) is prominently sized and placed slightly above center, drawing immediate attention. At the bottom, the pricing (`price`) sits above a solid call-to-action button background (`cta_background`) with contrasting white button text (`cta`). Soft circular patterns and organic wave shapes enhance the depth of the background.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Cream (#F5EFE6)
- Light Beige (#E8D3C1)
- Warm Taupe (#D0B49F)
- Rich Brown (#8B6E4E)
- Muted Mocha (#9E7F60)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Gold Accent (from product image)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated ALDO handbag in a muted, warm camel brown (#A97462) that dominates the visual. The leather texture is subtly crosshatched, creating visual depth without overpowering the simplicity. Gold-tone metallic accents (#D4AF37), including hardware, chains, and branding, add elegance and modernity, contrasting beautifully with the earthen base tone. These elements catch the light strategically, providing a natural highlight to the product. For a banner advertisement, a neutral ivory background (#F5F5F5) will enhance focus while allowing the handbag’s colors to pop. A complementary deep cocoa (#4E342E) may be used for text, ensuring stylish and readable messaging.
